## VirtualListProps interface

Props accepted by [VirtualList](./react-virtual-scroll.virtuallist.md)

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface VirtualListProps extends VirtualBaseProps 
```
**Extends:** [VirtualBaseProps](./react-virtual-scroll.virtualbaseprops.md)

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [children](./react-virtual-scroll.virtuallistprops.children.md) |  | [VirtualListItem](./react-virtual-scroll.virtuallistitem.md) | Component used as a template to render items in the list. Must implement [VirtualListItem](./react-virtual-scroll.virtuallistitem.md) interface. |
|  [innerComponent?](./react-virtual-scroll.virtuallistprops.innercomponent.md) |  | [VirtualInnerComponent](./react-virtual-scroll.virtualinnercomponent.md) | _(Optional)_ Component implementing [VirtualInnerComponent](./react-virtual-scroll.virtualinnercomponent.md)<!-- -->. Used to customize [VirtualList](./react-virtual-scroll.virtuallist.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [itemCount](./react-virtual-scroll.virtuallistprops.itemcount.md) |  | number | Number of items in the list |
|  [itemKey?](./react-virtual-scroll.virtuallistprops.itemkey.md) |  | (index: number, data: unknown) =&gt; React.Key | _(Optional)_ Function that defines the key to use for each item given item index and value of [VirtualBaseProps.itemData](./react-virtual-scroll.virtualbaseprops.itemdata.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [itemOffsetMapping](./react-virtual-scroll.virtuallistprops.itemoffsetmapping.md) |  | [ItemOffsetMapping](./react-virtual-scroll.itemoffsetmapping.md) | <p>Implementation of [ItemOffsetMapping](./react-virtual-scroll.itemoffsetmapping.md) interface that defines size and offset to each item in the list</p><p>Use [useFixedSizeItemOffsetMapping()](./react-virtual-scroll.usefixedsizeitemoffsetmapping.md) or [useVariableSizeItemOffsetMapping()](./react-virtual-scroll.usevariablesizeitemoffsetmapping.md) to create implementations for common cases.</p> |
|  [layout?](./react-virtual-scroll.virtuallistprops.layout.md) |  | [ScrollLayout](./react-virtual-scroll.scrolllayout.md) | _(Optional)_ Choice of 'vertical' or 'horizontal' layouts |

|  [outerComponent?](./react-virtual-scroll.virtuallistprops.outercomponent.md) |  | [VirtualOuterComponent](./react-virtual-scroll.virtualoutercomponent.md) | _(Optional)_ Component implementing [VirtualOuterComponent](./react-virtual-scroll.virtualoutercomponent.md)<!-- -->. Used to customize [VirtualList](./react-virtual-scroll.virtuallist.md)<!-- -->. |
